s4160: First year of Duke Cheng of Zheng (Mai), Dao Gong's younger brother. Chu attacked us.
s4352: Thirteen, Jin attacked and defeated us, troops camped at Wei, Chu came to rescue.
s4357: Ling Wang first year gave birth to bearded child.
s4358: Two, assembled with Jin at Hu Lao fortress.
s4360: Two, led feudal lords to attack Zheng, fortified Hu Lao.
s4368: Fourteen, Cheng Gong died. Jin led feudal lords to attack us.
s4376: Three, Wei Jiang insulted Yang Gan.
s4378: Twenty-one, sent Zi Chong to attack Wu, reached Heng Mountain. Sent He Ji to invade Chen.
s4381: Twenty-nine, broke Chu alliance, Chu invaded us.
s4384: First year of Duke Xi of Zheng (Yun)
s4392: Four, Wei Jiang persuaded to make peace with Rong and Di, Di came to Jin court.
s4397: Thirty, Chu attacked us. Cheng Gong died.
s4413: First year of Duke Ai of Chen (Ruo)
s4445: Three, Chu besieged us, duke fled back.
s4448: Five, Zi Si sent assassin to kill Xi Gong at night, falsely announced illness and death to feudal lords.
s4464: First year of Duke Jian of Zheng (Jia), Xi Gong's son.
s4470: Nine, with Jin attacked Zheng, assembled at river, asked duke's age twelve, could be capped, capped at Wei.
s4472: Nine, led Qi, Lu, Song, Wei, Cao to attack Zheng. Qin attacked us.
s4473: Thirteen, attacked Jin, Chu aided us.
s4474: Twenty-seven, attacked Zheng, camped at Wu Cheng, for Qin.
s4475: Twelve, Jin led us to attack Zheng.
s4476: Thirteen, Jin led us to attack Zheng. At Cao, duke favored consort.
s4479: Fourteen, Jin led us to attack Zheng.
s4480: Two, executed Zi Si. Jin led feudal lords to attack us, we made alliance. Chu angered, attacked us.
s4485: Nine, Wang Shu fled to Jin.
s4486: Ten, Chu and Zheng invaded our western borders.
s4487: Nineteen, ordered crown prince Guang and Gao Hou to assemble feudal lords at Zhong Li.
s4488: Ten, led feudal lords to attack Zheng. Xun Ying attacked Qin.
s4490: Twenty-eight, sent Zi Nang to rescue Zheng.
s4491: Thirteen, Zheng attacked us, Wei came to rescue.
s4496: Three, Jin led feudal lords to attack us, Chu came to rescue. Zi Kong caused disorder, Zi Chan attacked him.
s4502: Eleven, three Huan divided into three armies, each commanded army.
s4504: Eleven, led feudal lords to attack Zheng, Qin defeated us at Li. Duke said: 'I used Wei Jiang nine times to assemble feudal lords,' granted him music.
s4505: Fifteen, we sent Shu Zhang Bao to attack Jin and rescue Zheng, defeated them at Li.
s4507: Fourteen, Chu and Zheng attacked us.
